CLaRK_document_dtd.dtd: <!ELEMENT document (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT folder (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT group (#PCDATA)> <!ATTLIST group recursive (y|n) #REQUIRED > <!ELEMENT info (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT inputFiles (document*|group*)> <!ELEMENT item (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT key EMPTY> <!ATTLIST key expr CDATA #REQUIRED order (asc|desc) #IMPLIED trim (y|n) #IMPLIED normalize (y|n) #IMPLIED number (y|n) #IMPLIED reverse (y|n) #IMPLIED tokenizer CDATA #IMPLIED prefix (LC|I|RC|COM) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT keys key+> <!ELEMENT mode EMPTY> <!ATTLIST mode type (new|overwrite) "overwrite" extension CDATA #IMPLIED save (y|n) #IMPLIED overwrite (y|n) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT multiple (folder,output,mode,inputFiles?,outputFiles?)> <!ELEMENT name (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT output EMPTY> <!ATTLIST output type (separate|united) "separate" ufn CDATA #IMPLIED dtdname CDATA #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT outputFiles (document*)> <!ELEMENT outputFilter EMPTY> <!ATTLIST outputFilter cat (y|n) "y" num (y|n) "y" per (y|n) "y" keyval (y|n) "y" > <!ELEMENT statisticsquery (xpath,keys,tokenizer,outputFilter?,info?,multiple?)> <!ATTLIST statisticsquery toolName CDATA #FIXED "Statistics" > <!ELEMENT tokenizer (name,item*)> <!ELEMENT xpath (#PCDATA)> <!ATTLIST xpath Element_Name_Sensitive (true|false) "false" >
